snippet: Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman testified at Roger Clemens’s perjury trial that he did not want to hire Brian McNamee as Clemens’s personal trainer.
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman testifies at Roger Clemens's perjury trial that he did not want to hire Brian McNamee as Clemens's personal trainer after 1999 season; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman testified at Roger Clemens’s perjury trial that he did not want to hire Brian McNamee as Clemens’s personal trainer.

headline.seo: Cashman Testifies in Roger Clemens Perjury Trial
headline.main: Cashman Testifies About McNamee at Clemens Trial
